3. Create Realm App

Now that you’ve populated your Atlas database, this page will walk you through creating the Realm App and import all the code associated with it (e.g. functions, triggers):

  1. Create the WildAid Realm application:
    1. In the Atlas UI, click the “Realm” icon:

    2. Click “Skip questions and start new app”


    3. Configure Realm: Give the Realm App a name and link your cluster, then click “Create Realm Application”. Put the Realm App name into the template.

    4. Copy the Realm App ID using the “copy” icon, and paste into the template as “Realm App ID”
